product_name: Woolrich Impasse Shawl Pullover Sweater - Men's
long_description: The Woolrich Impasse Shawl pullover sweater captures classic military fatigue fashion in an updated design to keep you looking sharp on your around-town excursions. 100% cotton fabric is stitched into a plated jersey construction; fabric is soft and comfortable. Shawl neck with button closure.
short_description: The Woolrich Impasse Shawl pullover sweater captures classic military fatigue fashion in an updated design to keep you looking sharp on your around-town excursions.
